Email draft:
Subject: Aligning on next steps for Safety Office Information

Hi david.a.royes@gmail.com,

I wanted to follow up on "Safety Office Information" under the Sm. Projects & Tasks workstream. This is a standard priority item with a due date of 2025-11-30.

Recommended next move:
- ---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Rhonda Harper <Rhonda.Harper@floridaconference.com>
Date: Wed, Jul 23, 2025, 9:34 AM
Subject: Safety Office Information Needed
To: Rhonda Harper <Rhonda.Harper@floridaconference.com>


Good morning,

Can you please complete the attached Safety Officer Information form for
your church and return it to me?  My list is very old and the information
on E Adventist is incomplete for many church locations.  I would like to
make a new spreadsheet of our Safety Officers so that it can be used to
announce our upcoming safety training in early October.

Thank you for your assistance in getting this information back to me.

Blessings,

*Rhonda Harper*
*Risk Management Director*
*P: 407-644-5000 | F: 407-618-0277*

*[image: RISK_MANAGEMENT_SIGNATURE]*



You're receiving this message because you're a member of the FLC_Church

If the effort is 0.1h consider pairing it with a focus block or automation assist to reduce calendar drag.
